_usage: nesting/hatchling for season time depending on the observations available: emergence is considered to occur 60 days after nesting. Choose release mode square or disk. If square, lon_0/lat_0 is the beach northern point and lon_1/lat_1 the southern point of the beach. If disk, lon_0/lat_0 is the center of the circle, and lon_1/lat1 also (repetition needed)
